column4: is anyone available to help me with this admittedly minor but annoying problem?
sorry.  thanks ubottu
when i move my mouse all the way to the edge of the screen i cannot click on anything...can someone help
songza does what you want
is there a particular point that your mouse stops working?
just on the edge of the screen..at the farthest point
i have all my coworkers using songza
is there something on the edge of the screen that you wish to click?

yes...while in firefox or ather windows id like to click on the scroll bar..so whats happeining now is that i move the mmouse all the way over with a quick finger flick then have to bring it in  alittle...not a huge problem but annoying
i was just looking around for issues the new version of X, maybe that would be related, but I don't see any known issues like that.   sorry
thanks goat|lappy..even a push in the right direction of what to google is much appreciated
try something for me,  in terminal, type the following:  sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.bak; sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf
then in nano change vmmouse to mouse, and ctrl+x to save
sorry, just a sec, wrong value
ok
give me another min
sure thing
can you paste your /var/log/Xorg.0.log
http://paste.ubuntu.com/69376/
whats your environment, is this 8.10?
yes 8.10

unfortunately my searches are coming up with not much,  you can try googling with such search terms as mouse clicks X don't work at edges don't respond intrepid ubuntu,   or you can try detailing your problem again, any maybe someone here will know whats up
